Description: Fragment of oval handle of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora, gradual curve. Clay medium purplish brown; mixed inclusions. Rectangular stamp with Greek inscription.
Curator's comments: Petrie Diary 1884-5 (EES Archive XVII 47) p. 59, 15. From same die as a piece from Kaunos, B.Schmaltz, Die Hellenistischen Amphorenstempel vom Kaunos (Asia Minor Studien 79) 71, KA 159.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0464)
